title: Lion
description: Why did the lion break up with his lioness girlfriend? Because she was a cheetah!

title: Eagle
description: What do you call an eagle who plays the piano? A talon-ted musician!

title: Elephant
description: Why did the elephant bring a suitcase to the zoo? Because he wanted to pack his trunk!

title: Tiger
description: Why did the tiger lose at poker? Because he was playing with a cheetah!

title: Giraffe
description: What do you call a giraffe who steals? A high-neck criminal!

title: Penguin
description: Why don't penguins like talking to strangers at parties? Because they find it hard to break the ice!

title: Kangaroo
description: Why did the kangaroo stop drinking coffee? Because it made him too jumpy!

title: Dolphin
description: What do you call a dolphin magician? An illusionist!

title: Panda
description: Why don't pandas like to play cards? Because they're afraid of being bamboozled!

title: Cheetah
description: Why did the cheetah lose the race? Because it took a leopard-ty of shortcuts!

title: Crocodile
description: Why did the crocodile go to the dentist? Because it had a toothy smile!

title: Gorilla
description: Why did the gorilla like bananas? Because they were a-peeling!

title: Ostrich
description: Why did the ostrich cross the road? To prove he wasn't a chicken!

title: Polar Bear
description: What do you call a polar bear in the jungle? Lost!

title: Hippopotamus
description: Why did the hippo get thrown out of the bar? Because he was a huge boar!

title: Zebra
description: Why can't you ever trust a zebra? Because they're always trying to pull the wool over your eyes!

title: Rhinoceros
description: Why did the rhino bring two sets of pants? In case he got a hole in one!

title: Sloth
description: Why was the sloth late to the meeting? Because he took things slow!

title: Orangutan
description: Why don't orangutans play cards in the wild? Because there are too many cheetahs!

title: Hedgehog
description: Why don't hedgehogs share their food? Because they're too prickly about it!

title: Wolf
description: Why don't wolves ever play hide and seek? Because good luck hiding when you're a howling success!

title: Koala
description: Why did the koala get fired from his job? Because he would only do the bear minimum!

title: Seagull
description: Why did the seagull fly over the sea? Because if it flew over the bay, it would be a bagel!

title: Otter
description: Why was the otter so happy? Because he found his significant otter!
